summary.span: 为 的事件添加处理程序。

span.span: Adds a handler for an event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建委托时，请标识用于处理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that handles the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时都会调用事件处理程序。Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 可以添加用于处理一个事件的多个委托。Multiple delegates can be added to handle an event. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 使用下面的代码添加和移除处理程序。Handlers are added and removed using the following code. 此代码示例是发送电子邮件 SDK 示例的一部分，来自 SendMailActivity.cs 文件。This code example is part of the Send Email SDK sample and is from the SendMailActivity.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [发送电子邮件活动示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669)。For more information, see [Send Email Activity Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669). remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为用于移除事件委托的方便而直接的方法提供。Provided as a convenient direct method for removing an event delegate. 创建委托时，请标识将要处理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时都会调用事件处理程序。Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 使用下面的代码添加和移除处理程序。Handlers are added and removed using the following code. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [发送电子邮件活动示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669)。For more information, see [Send Email Activity Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669). remarks.format: ## Remarks 将值直接设置为 。 sets the value directly to the . 同样， 直接将处理程序添加到类型事件的属性。Similarly, adds a handler directly to properties of type event. 为同一个属性调用这些方法时，它们是互斥的。These methods are exclusive when they are called for the same property. 如果调用了 ，则忽略先前使用 （在事件中为 ）设置的值。If is called, then the values previously set using ( in events) are disregarded. 采用相反的方法时，情况也是如此： () 将重置使用 分配的绑定。The same is true the other way around: () resets the binding assigned with . ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何创建活动并将其作为子级添加到复合活动中，还演示如何设置此类型的 权限。The following code shows how to create activities and add them as children to a composite activity and includes setting the permission for this type. 此外，还演示如何使用 方法。In addition, the use of the method is illustrated. 此代码示例摘自 ThrowWorkFlow.cs 文件中的“引发 SDK”示例。This code example is part of the Throw SDK sample and is from the ThrowWorkFlow.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用 Throw](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc)。For more information, see [Using Throw](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc). MemberSignature.Value: Custom Event Disposed As EventHandler Implements System.ComponentModel.IComponent

summary.span: 表示处理组件的“Disposed”事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the Disposed event of a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建 Disposed 委托时，请标识将处理事件的方法。When you create a Disposed delegate, you identify the method that handles the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserData As IDictionary
public: property System::Collections::IDictionary ^ UserData { System::Collections::IDictionary ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 ，它将自定义数据与此类实例关联。

span.span: Gets an that associates custom data with this class instance.

value.span: 一个字典，它用作扩展性挂钩，供开发人员用于操作设计工具的 声明，以及将自定义数据与单个活动声明关联。

span.span: A dictionary that acts as an extensibility hook for developers to manipulate declarations for a design tool and associate custom data with individual activity declarations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性为 `metaproperty` ，这意味着它在运行时是不可变的。This property is a `metaproperty`, which means it is immutable at run time. `Metaproperties` 不要在运行时创建属性实例后更改，因此在设计时必须将属性设置为文字值。`Metaproperties` do not change after a property instance is created at run time, so the property must be set to a literal value at design time. 此属性不在 Windows Workflow Foundation 提供的默认 声明实现中使用。This property is not used in the default declaration implementations provided by Windows Workflow Foundation. 此集合未序列化，集合中包含的数据不会从设计时保留到运行时。This collection is not serialized; data that the collection contains is not persisted from design time to run time.
